K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-1: a'arya s'a ga ra n'a ga r'a dza pa ri pritstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-3: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-8: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-9: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-10: gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-11: sems can thams cad kyi spobs pas mgu bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180a-12: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi @180b dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-2: snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa lam pas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags la snyan par brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-5: bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-6: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-7: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-8: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par sgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-10: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-11: lus dang dag dang sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-13: snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-14: bskal pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-15: sengge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-16: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:180b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-2: lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-6: lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-15: rin chen khar ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-17: lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-25: chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-27: mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-29: tshig rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-30: gtsug na rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-35: skar ma la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-37: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-39: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181a-40: byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-0: 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems @181b dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-1: bzang skyong la sogs ba skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-2: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-4: lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-5: lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-6: lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-7: lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-8: lha'i bu ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-9: rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-10: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-11: lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la la sogs pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-12: lha'i rgyal po dge rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-13: lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-14: lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:181b-15: lha'i rgyal po dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po @182a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-2: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi khri nyis stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-3: dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po sum khri nyis stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-4: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-5: bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-6: de ma yin pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-13: lto 'phye chen po 'og gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-15: lha thams cad kyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa'i sengge'i khri la ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen du 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te lam me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-18: lhang nge nge zhing bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182a-19: de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-0: rin po che'i gdugs des thams @182b cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-1: rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan phreng 'bum phrag dum 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-4: mu tig dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-5: gser lta bu'i mu tig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-6: zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-7: padma lta bu'i mu tig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-8: nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-9: mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-10: 'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-14: yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-15: me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-16: bar snang la'ang 'brug sgra chen po bsgrags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-18: tsandan gyi phye ma dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-19: tsandan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:182b-20: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-0: sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga @183a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-5: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-7: klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-19: glu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-23: byug pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183a-29: glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-0: gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i @183b tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-1: 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-2: 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos padma chus mi chags pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-3: 'jig rten snang ba rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-4: 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-5: dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-6: 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-7: snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-8: bsod snyoms zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-9: khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kunda zla ba dung mdog 'dra; ;'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:183b-10: zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad; ;de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-0: khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par @184a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-1: bgyid; ;lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-2: 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-3: dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-4: khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-5: khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-6: gang dag gis ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-7: thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud pa de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags blta'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-9: khyod kyi thad du lhags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g-yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-10: mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-11: de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngom par 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184a-12: mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma brla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-0: dbu ba glog sprin chu yi chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur @184b thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-1: gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-2: de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga bskyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-3: gang gi don du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-4: gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-5: gang gi don du sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-6: rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-7: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-8: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-14: khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:184b-15: ngas dri ba dris ba de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i @185a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-1: skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-5: ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-6: mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-13: 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa 'thob pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-17: dga' ba'i shas che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-18: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-19: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-24: chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-25: thos pa tshol bas chog ma 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-26: thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185a-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185b-0: yo @185b byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185b-1: rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185b-4: byang chub sems dpa' ches zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:185b-5: chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:195b-27: de'i rnam par rtse ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-1: rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang kun tu ston la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-2: des byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la ma chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rnam par grol ba la lhag par dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis zag pa zad pa shes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-6: shes pa de mngon sum du byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-7: ma yin la sems can thams cad kyi zag pa zad par bya ba kho na'i phyir yang 'khor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa drug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong pa la 'jug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-15: snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-16: thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196a-19: smon pa med pas yongs su bsgos pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-1: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-4: de la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-5: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mthong la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yang dag par bcom pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-6: 'khor ba'ang mthong la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mthong la byang chub kyi snying po la'ang gzhol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-9: sems can gyi spyod pa'i rjes su'ang 'jug la sems can gyi spyod pa dben par yang shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-11: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-12: gzhan yang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-13: 'dus byas kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su'ang 'jug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-14: 'dus ma byas pa'ang thob pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-15: 'dus byas thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'ang mthong la 'dus byas kyang thob pa'o; ;klu'i bdag po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-17: 'dus byas la spyod pa na'ang 'dus ma byas shes pas sgrib pa med pa la 'dus ma byas pa thob pa la'ang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyis sgrib pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-18: der sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:196b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-0: @197a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-2: cho ga shes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-4: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-5: snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-7: bsam pa las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-8: sems la dbang byed pa'i thabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-10: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-13: cho ga shes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-18: bdag gi bde ba la mi lta bas yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-19: brtson pa brtan pas sems can la bde ba sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-21: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-22: gong du'ang yon tan khyad par can la'ang 'god par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-24: chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-28: byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-30: brda sprod pa la mkhas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197a-34: shes bzhin gyis sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-0: yang dag pa la tshul @197b bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-1: sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-2: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-3: dgongs pa'i tshig ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-5: chos drug po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-8: brda sprod pa la mkhas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-11: byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-13: sgyu ma'i chos nyid phung po lnga yongs su shes pa dang yang ldan la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral te song pa nyid la spyod yul ba'ang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-14: 'du byed thams cad kyi skye ba med par yang rab tu shes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye bar yang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-15: brtson 'grus brtan pas byang chub kyi bsam pa'ang yongs su mi gtong la khams gsum pas kyang yid rtag tu skrag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-16: mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang mi ltung la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su tshol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-17: sems can rnams la'ang lta la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang gsog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-18: mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid la'ang yid ches la ye shes kyi tshogs kyang gsog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa la'ang ma chags pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:197b-22: chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-0: byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba @198a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-4: byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-5: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-7: sbyin pas nye bar brtan pa yin te mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-8: tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te ngan song thams cad yang dag par bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-9: bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa yin te dbang po ma nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-10: brtson 'grus brtan pa yin te dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams kyis cho ga mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-11: bsam gtan la gnas pa yin te cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-12: shes rab dang ldan pa yin te nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-13: thabs la mkhas pa yin te kun tu yongs su bsngo ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-14: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin te don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-17: spobs pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-18: gzungs thob pa yin te sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-19: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-21: chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-22: byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198a-23: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-0: @198b byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-2: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-3: bdag gi 'khrul ba la so sor rtog par byed kyi gzhan gyi 'khrul ba la mi rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-4: srog gi phyir yang gzhan dag la brnyas par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-5: rnyed pa dang bkur sti thob pas kyang mtho bar mi 'dzin la ma thob pas kyang dma' bar mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-6: sems can thams cad la yon gnas kyi sems bskyed de sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-7: bgo bsha'i ngang tshul can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-8: chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-9: gzhan gyi bde bas dga' ba yin te phrag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-10: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la 'gyod pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-12: chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-13: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-16: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin te thebs la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-19: chos thams cad ji lta ba la mkhas pa yin te chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:198b-20: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa yin te sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rig pa'i cho ga shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-1: par khong du chud pa shes pa yin te chags pa med par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-2: zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pas kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar spyod par byed la zag pa thams cad kyang zad par mi byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-4: chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-5: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-8: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-10: sems can yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa dang; chos yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dben pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-11: ye shes yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-14: sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-15: phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-16: da ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir legs par gnas pa'i chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-19: gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-20: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-21: gsum gang zhe na; lus yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis nye bar brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199a-22: ngag yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mtha' yas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-0: sems yongs su dag par @199b bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-2: chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-3: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-8: chos rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-9: dkar po rnam par mthong bas spyod pa la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-10: sems can kyi bsam pa rnams la ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-11: shin tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma skyes ma byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-13: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-15: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-24: mi ma yin pa khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-26: byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gi ni mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-27: dge slong khri bzhi stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-28: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-29: dge slong ma brgyad stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:199b-30: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-0: @200a *// lha'i bu lnga stong gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-1: 'dod chags dang bral ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de'i tshe rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-3: 'jig rten yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-4: me tog gi char chen po'ang bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-5: lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang bar snang las sil snyan brgya stong dag dkrol te ched du brjod pa 'di skad kyang ched du brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-6: aa la la de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-7: chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba 'di chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-8: yul w'a ra n'a si drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bskor ba gang yin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-12: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa'i don mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-13: gzhan yang sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-15: sems can gang dag thos nas kyang 'chang bar byed pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-17: mir skye ba rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-18: de dag gis ni; de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200a-20: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-0: chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag @200b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag gi ngan song thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-2: de dag lha dang mir skye ba'i sgo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-4: de dag ni; yongs su mya ngan las 'das zin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-10: khyed kyis chig 'di legs par smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-11: mdo sde'i tshig bstan pa 'di lta bu dag la dga' ba thob pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-12: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-13: theg pa chen pos 'dul ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-15: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-16: phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no; ;chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba thob pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba ma gtogs pa de dag 'gro bar mi 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-18: gang dag bsngags pa thos nas 'jin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-19: de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa rnams lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-20: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-21: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:200b-23: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bshad pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:201a-0: @201a *// yid bde ba skyes nas rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag par byed pa'i rin po che'i bkod pa kun tu 'od zer 'byung ba'i 'od can zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab par phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:201a-1: nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis kyang nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:201a-2: zla ba gnyis kyi 'od mog mog por byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:201a-3: 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad du aa la la sangs rgyas byung ba ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221a-23: mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dang bral ba'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221b-7: thar pa'i lam du khrid pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221b-12: sems can thams cad kyi phan pa tshol ba'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221b-31: sems can thams cad kyi bdag po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221b-32: pha ma dang nye dur gyur pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:221b-34: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su mthun pa'o /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-3: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni; de'i sems kyi grogs byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-4: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-10: de'i dus tshigs kyi bde ba byed pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-12: de'i thams cad las mi 'jigs par byed pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-21: de'i gnyi ga'i don byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-22: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-23: de'i ci 'dod pa'i don yang dag par thob par byed pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222a-26: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-10: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs kyi kha dog ni lus yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang gzungs 'dis chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-12: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na mgo bor gyur pa lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-13: brgya byin ri rab kyi zom na bdag por gyur pa lta bu'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-14: tshangs pa lta bur tshangs par gyur pa'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lta bur lus khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-16: rgya mtsho gting dpag dka' zhing mu med pa lta bu'ang yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-18: lha rnams kyi snying du sdug ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-21: nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba nya ba 'dug pa lta bur blta na sdug pa'ang yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:222b-25: ri phug na 'dug pa'i sengge lta bur chos kyi sgra chen po sgrog pa'ang yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223a-6: chu'i rgyun gyis me la bya ba lta bur nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'ang yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223a-9: sa gzhi rdzas rnams kyis mi bskyod pa lta bur bde ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223a-11: rlung gis shing gi lo ma rnams la bya ba lta bur phas kyi rgol ba thams cad g-yo bar byed pa'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223a-12: rnam thos kyi bu rin po che thams cad 'byor pa lta bur chos kyi nor bu mthun par sbyin pa'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'ang yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-7: chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-11: spos brgya phrag du ma yod pa'i spos kyi za ma tog ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-12: sems can thams cad spos kyis yongs su mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-13: sems can thams cad la legs par smra bas yang dag par mgu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-16: sgra thams cad la 'jug pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-18: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs gcig pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-20: 'di na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:223b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyad par bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-0: 'di na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba gan @224a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa grub par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzi byin can zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mya ngan med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na legs so zhes bya ba'i tshul zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-5: 'di na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-7: 'di na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgrol bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-9: 'di na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying po can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nye bar zhi bar spyod pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-5: btang snyoms zhes pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa don grub kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-9: gnyi ga las zhi ba zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-15: rtsa ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-17: rtsa ba zhi bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-18: 'di na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-19: gzhan dag na gnas pa rnams zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-22: 'di na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-24: 'di na dbang po rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-25: gzhan dag na rab tu shes pa rnams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-26: 'di na stobs rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:224b-27: gzhan dag na bstan pa rnams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-1: kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-2: gzhan dag na rjes su 'gro ba rnams zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-3: 'di na lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-4: gzhan dag na sgrol ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-5: 'di na so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-6: gzhan dag na mngon sum gyi sgo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-7: 'di na chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-8: gzhan dag na legs par sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-10: lhag mthong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-11: gzhan dag na nye bar zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-12: rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-13: 'di na rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-14: gzhan dag na don yod pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-15: 'di na bsod nams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-16: gzhan dag na phan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-17: 'di na ye shes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-18: gzhan dag na rtogs byed ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-19: 'di na rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-20: gzhan dag na lam gyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-21: 'di na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-22: gzhan dag na 'da' bar mi bya zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-23: 'di na mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni; gzhan dag na nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-24: 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225a-25: bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-0: 'jig rten @225b gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-1: bgegs med pa'i tshul can no zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-3: nges pa'i tshig gi tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-4: brda'i tshig gi tshig 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-5: sangs rgyas kyi tshig gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-7: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de dag gi nges pa'i tshig ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-10: nges pa'i tshig gi tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-11: brda'i tshig gi tshig bstan pa phyogs bcu dag tu 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-13: bskal pa las lhag par ngas bstan kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nges pa'i tshig gi tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-14: brda'i tshig gi tshig bstan pa rnams mthar thug pa gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-15: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' drug khris gzungs thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-16: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-17: mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-18: mi sum khri nyis stong gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-23: mun pa mun nag dang bral pa'i lam 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:225b-24: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-1: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-2: yun ring po dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snga rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par gyi yon tan bkod pa bsdus pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-5: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-6: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par gyi yon tan bkod pa bsdus pa de 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-14: mi rnams kyis gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-16: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya pa ji tsam pa de tsam gyi gling bzhi par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226a-17: de lta bu'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya ni; bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par gyi yon tan bkod pa bsdus par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-0: de ltar tha gru che zhing @226b yangs pa de ltar tshad med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od 'dra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-2: de nyid kyi snang bas rtag tu snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che'i dra bas kun tu khebs shing dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-9: bla re chen po rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-11: mtshan mo bar snang las kyang sil snyan brgya stong dag ma brdungs ma dkrol bar sgra rang 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-13: glu dbyangs kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar byas te sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-14: glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-18: nyon mongs pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sgra ni; mi 'byung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-22: mgu ba dang ldan pa'i sgra de dag 'ba' zhig 'byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-23: de thos pa tsam gyi lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-24: mi de dag thams cad kyi dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-27: bde ba thob la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang de dag la gnod par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-28: 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lag mthil ltar mnyam la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-29: ka tsa linda'i gos ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:226b-30: 'jig rten gyi khams de na ngan song ngan 'gror gdags pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-0: mi de dag kyang dag pa 'ba' @227a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-3: phal cher rgya chen po la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-4: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni; nyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-7: de dag gi longs spyod thams cad kyang yid la bsam pas 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-9: mi de dag bde zhing longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-10: de na su'ang sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-13: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-14: nye bar spyad pa ji lta ba bzhin du de na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang lo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi phrag brgyad du bsgres pa snyed du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-16: mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang de nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-17: de na tshe'i mthar ma phyin par su'ang 'chi ba med do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yang khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-18: de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-21: de'i tshe de'i dus na de ra 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-22: rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de'i btsun mo bud med lha mo dang 'dra ba khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227a-23: de dag gi nang na de'i btsun mo dam pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-0: dri @227b ma med pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-1: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-2: dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-3: dga' ldan ma zhes bya ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-4: de'i bu'ang brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-5: tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa; mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-6: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-8: rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de'ang grong khyer chen po dga' 'byung zhes bya ba na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-9: grong khyer chen po de'ang shar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-12: lho'i ngos re re la dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi bzhi yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po'ang grong khyer chen po dga' 'byung de nyid du sku bltams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-14: grong khyer chen po de'i nang du rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa'i pho brang rin po che sna bdun gyis byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-15: grong khyer chen po de'i nang na lam po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-16: srang gi sgo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-18: srang gi sgo thams cad na'ang khyim bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-19: grong khyer chen po de'ang ra ba rim bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-21: ta la'i phreng rim bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-22: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun gyis bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-23: skyed mos tshal khris kyang bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-24: 'obs bdun rim gyis kyang bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:227b-25: 'obs de dag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-4: ngang dur la sogs pa rtag tu skad 'byin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-5: de ltar grong khyer chen po de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po de'ang grong khyer chen po dga' 'byung de nyid nags tshal spos mchog 'od ces bya ba gang du rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pas bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang byas pa na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-7: rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa bu dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-10: tshal za'i 'khor dang bcas pas bskal pa 'bum tham pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba'i yo byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-11: longs spyod thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-13: de nas rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de 'khor de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228a-14: de 'ongs par thugs su chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-0: rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug thob @228b par gyur la dge ba'i chos rnams kyis kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-2: dad pa la gnas te dge ba gang yin pa tshol zhing nga rgyal med par 'phags pa dag gi thad du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-3: chos don du gnyer te chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ste rtag tu don gyi rjes su lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-4: mi rtag pa'i chos nyid la so sor rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-5: 'dus byas kyi nyes pa rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-6: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no snyam du dran pas nye bar gnas par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-7: bag yod par byed de 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la lhag par zhen pa med cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang zad par mi byed la gong du'ang rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi bsam pa'ang rnam par mi spong ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-10: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-11: rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos chos kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-12: dge ba'i chos rnams kyis kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-13: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po la rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-15: chos gang dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-16: byang chub sems dpas chos la dbang phyug thob par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:228b-17: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-2: byang chub sems dpas chos la dbang phyug thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-4: rnam par rtse zhing mi nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-7: bskyed du med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-8: ye shes kyis bsdus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-9: yongs su sbyang bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-10: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-11: shes rab dang ye shes nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-13: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-14: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-15: chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs pas byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-16: bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-17: sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-19: brjed ngas pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-20: chos ji lta ba bzhin rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-21: tshul gcig pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-22: gnyis su med pa yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229a-23: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-0: chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub @229b sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-1: chos kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-3: gzhan yang rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-5: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi dbang phyug thob bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas rin po che'i za ma tog gi gzungs las brtsams nas lo 'bum gyi bar du rgyas par rnam par dbye bas de la yang dag par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-8: rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de'ang rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad btang ste las gzhan mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-9: sems kyi rgyud rnam par g-yeng ba med par dpung dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-10: 'khor dang bcas pas chos mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-11: des lo 'bum po de'i bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-18: sdug pa thams cad la nges pa'i rtog pa rnams la brtag par ma bsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-19: chos la sdug par nges pa yid la byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-20: byang chub kyi sems kyi bsam pa la gnas par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-21: byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-22: snying rje chen po'i go cha ba gos nas chos 'ba' zhig mnyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de las lo 'bum tham pa'i bar du dam pa'i chos nyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:229b-24: thos nas kyang rin po che'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di nyid kyi rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-1: bskal pa sa ya phrag bdun gyi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-2: bskal pa khri'i bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-3: rnam par dag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-5: de'i mig lam du snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-6: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang des yongs su bzung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-7: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-10: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-11: dran pa dag pa zhes bya ba'i thas pa'i gzungs kyang thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-12: thos pa'i gzungs des na sangs rgyas brgyas gsungs pa'i chos yang dag par 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-14: de dag gi ma de rnams kyis kyang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-15: btsun mo de dag gi nang nas kyang bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-16: byang chub tu sems bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-17: bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-18: bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-19: lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag dgu bcus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-21: lha dang mi brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bzod pa thob bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-22: nyan thos kyi theg pa ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-23: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230a-24: dge slong khri drug stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-0: len pa med par zag pa @230b rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-1: rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa'ang rgyal srid thams cad spangs nas lha dang mi'i 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid la rten bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-2: dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-3: rab tu byung ba de thos nas rgyal po de'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rab tu byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-4: de dag kyang rab tu byung bar shes nas yul gyi mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-6: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i nang nas kyang btsun mo dam pa bzhi rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-8: de ltar na; dag pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yongs su spyad pa byas pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i gsung rab de dag dga' dga' ltar 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-12: the tshom za bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod nyid 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:230b-19: rgyal po'i bu'i mi de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-0: 'khor 'dir 'dus shing 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @231a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-4: rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs gang de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal lha'i rgyal po des rgyal po bsod nams mi zad pa de la bstan pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-5: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-7: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di nyid de'i tshe rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-13: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mang po las mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-14: khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po las gzungs 'di'i don yang dang yang du thos te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-18: 'di ltar rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-19: 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-20: 'di ltar shes rab dang ye shes dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-22: gang dag mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di'i ming cam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231a-23: bstan pa'i phyogs tsam thos pa de dag thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad par nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-0: gzungs 'di'i rgyu @231b dang mthun pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-3: gzungs kyi nges par 'byung ba'i srung ba 'di phyi ma'i 'dus phyi ma'i tshe sbyod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kho na las gyur par blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-6: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sgo yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-7: spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'jug pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-8: ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-9: gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rtsa ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-10: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-12: byang chub sems dpas phyogs bcur chags pa med cing thogs pa med par so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis chos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa gang yin pa de'ang mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'ba' zhig gi rgyu dang mthun pa las gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-14: de la mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di la 'jug pa'i tshig rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:231b-34: ma ti bi sho dha na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-10: ku sha la b'a si ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-27: sarba de ba ta pa ri gri hi te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-30: aa nu dzny'a na prahma na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-32: p'a li ta lo ka p'a le /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-47: aa bardza n'am pa ri sha da /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-51: aa nu pa tstse da stvi ratna na bi dha ta sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-52: mee tr'i sarba satv'a n'a; stu ta sarba gu na aarthi kee:/

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-56: yongs su srung ba'i tshig yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:232a-59: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:238b-4: gzungs ni chos nyid 'gal ba ma yin la //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-0: @239a *// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rngo mi thogs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-4: klu khri nyis stong po 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-6: 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de las byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i gtam gcig thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-7: thos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-11: legs so legs so zhes tshig tu smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-14: slong mo ster ba'i khyim yongs su bzung ba'i phyir tshul khrims rnams nyams su ma blangs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-15: tshul khrims nyams par byas pa de na 'di dag de nas shi 'phos nas klu'i skye gnas su skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-16: 'di dag gi theg pa chen po'i gtam de thos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-17: bcom ldan 'das de la'ang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-18: zhes bya ba gsol ba'i rgyu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-21: da ltar nga las theg pa chen po'i gtam thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239a-22: mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs bstan pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-0: lhag @239b pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-1: ngas 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-2: bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la mchod pa byas nas byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs te bskal pa mngon par dga' zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i snying por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-3: ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-5: chos bla ma zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-6: shes rab bla ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan 'di bzhir mthun pa sha stag gi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-7: de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig kho na la 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-9: bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-12: gang gi tshe bdag bskal pa'i dang por rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-13: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-14: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:239b-16: klu'i bu mo dag nyung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-3: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-5: klu'i bu mo dag kyang 'di ltar tshad ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-6: grangs kyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-14: gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dag la yongs su rdzogs par ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-18: yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la de dag gi lta ba'ang drang por gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-26: rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad cho ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-28: tshul khrims nyams te shi 'phos nas klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi gsung rang las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-0: rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rab tu byung ba las tshul khrims 'chal par gyur pas shi 'phos te klu rnams kyi skye gnas @240b su skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-3: rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu cho ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-5: tshul khrims nyams te shi 'phos nas klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-9: rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu byung ba las rtsod pa sna tshogs dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-27: dge bsnyen ma sdig can rnams tshul khrims nyams pas klu'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:240b-32: rab tu byung bar gtogs la tshul khrims nyams pa klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-4: rab tu byung bar gtogs la tshul khrims nyams pa klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-5: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gi sbyor ba ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-10: klu'i skye gnas de nas shi 'phos nas lhag pa'i bsam pa de'i stobs kyis lha dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-13: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241a-17: 'di ltar sems can de dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams @241b ni; mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-1: thos pa don mchis pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-3: 'di ltar smad du ma mchis pa'i las can rnams kyi sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'ang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-5: de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du rgyur 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-7: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-9: thos pa'i don mchis par sems bskyed par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-10: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don mchis par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-11: bdag sems rmongs par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-12: dge ba la rmongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:241b-14: snying rje chen po la rmongs par ma gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-0: 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i @242a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas lo bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-4: zhag bdun du bshad kyang mthar phyin par bshad par mi spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-5: khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs de tsam du tshad med pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-9: de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-16: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-17: 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242a-18: 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs @242b su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-1: bde gshegs bsod nams brgyas spras sku mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-2: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan pa'i sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-3: zla ba lta bur dri med dag pa'i zhal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-4: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-5: bcom ldan dri med dri ma gsum bral ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-6: tha ba mi mnga' rnam dag padma'i spyan; ;lha dang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-7: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-8: bcom ldan tshems snyoms thags bzang dkar bar ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-9: stobs bcu mnga' zhing dri bsung gda' ba'i zhal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-10: rga dang 'chi ba'i mthar thug mdzad pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-11: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-16: bcom ldan tshangs pa'i sgra skad sgrog pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-17: mi'am ci dang ka la pingka dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-18: rnga sgra lta bur snyan cing dga' ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-19: mnyen por gsung ba 'dzum pa'i thabs gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-20: 'dren pa thogs pa med pa'i blo mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-21: dus gsum 'gro ba'i spyod dang mos pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-22: dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-23: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:242b-24: bcom ldan sman pa'i rgyal po mi rnams dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-2: bcom ldan gtan du bde ba ston pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-3: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-4: yon tan mnga' ba bdag la bka' stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-5: lha dang mi rnams khrag khrig nyan cing mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-6: thos nas yid ni rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa bgyid par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-14: mthong lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-17: bskal pa grangs med pa phrag brgyad brgyan bskal pa kun tu lta ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don yod pa spyod cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa mnyes par byas te mchod par byas nas rab tu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-1: sems can tshad med pa'ang theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa de'ang 'byor pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-12: longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du de na mi rnams kyi'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang lo khri thub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-14: de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-15: bye ba phrag drug cu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod de sems can gang dag gi mig sngar snang ba de dag kyang mthong ba'i mod la byams pa'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-22: mthong ba'i mod la sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-23: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-24: dang po mthong bas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:243b-26: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-4: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
