K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brten pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-9: sems can su'ang tshul khrims nyams pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-11: cho ga nyams pa'am; 'tsho ba nyams par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-12: de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-13: sems can de nas shi 'phos pa su'ang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur te; de dag thams cad lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244a-15: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi bzhin kyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-0: mu tig gi dra ba nor bu rin po che 'bum gyis spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su @244b bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-1: mi dbang zla ba dri med 'od kyi zhal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-2: gzi brjid mtha' yas lha dang mis mchod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-3: mtshungs med stobs ldan mtha' yas shugs mnga' ba; ;ye shes tshad ma mchis la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-4: phan par mdzad pa'i ye shes tshad ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-5: de bzhin shes rab 'od kyang bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-6: tshul khrims dri med rab brtan rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-7: mi dbang mkha' dkyil 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-8: bskal pa dpag tu med pa mtha' yas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-9: spyod pa spyad nas sangs rgyas ye shes brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-10: des na 'gro ba'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-11: de bzhin de dag dbang po bsam pa mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-12: 'jig rten bcom ldan gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-13: de phyir 'gro ba blta bas chog ma 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-14: de yi nyon mongs skye bar mi 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-15: de tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab tu zhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-16: ka la pingka khu byug mi'am ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-17: de bzhin tshangs pa'i sgra dang lha min sgra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-18: phyogs bcu dag na yid 'ong sgra de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-19: bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis mnan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-20: mkha' las zla bas la ltung yang gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-21: rgya mtsho bskams shing ri rab snyil yang gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-22: sa la gnam lhung dum bu brgyar 'gyur gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-23: rgyal ba'i bka' ni gzhan du yong mi gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-24: bden pa'i brtul zhugs rab 'brel ston pas 'dir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:244b-25: sangs rgyas ye shes gtso bos bdag lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-0: @245a *// bdag ni rgyal ba rang byung yon gnas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-1: bdag la yid gnyis som nyi dogs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-2: phyogs bcu dag tu rin chen legs spras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-3: bye ba mtha' yas 'dren pa rnams la phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-4: byang chub sems gcig bskyed pa gang lags la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-5: bsod nams snga mas 'di yi char mi phod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-6: gang zhig byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-7: de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog tu 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-8: gang zhig 'dren rnams tshul 'di mi gcod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-9: de ni stobs bcu kun gyi bka' drin gzo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-10: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid des tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di smras pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-11: srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-12: de dag gis tshig 'di skad du gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod des byang chub brnyes pa de'i tshe bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'phrad de 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa der skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-14: bsnyen bkur yang bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245a-15: bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og tu bdag cag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-0: bcom ldan 'das @245b kyis kyang de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba don yod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-1: lung bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-4: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-5: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-6: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-7: 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rgya mtsho chen por sang gdugs tshod gsol bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-10: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-15: de ma lags par yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-16: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-17: dam pa'i chos thos pas kyang 'khor ba thog ma ma mchis pa'i mtha' rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-18: bdag gi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas kyang yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-19: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis brnyas par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-20: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid bstan par 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:245b-21: bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang ldan pa'i chos nye bar bstan pa bgyis par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la @246a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-2: sems can tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-3: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-4: yid bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te dpung dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-5: 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i nang du phyir song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-6: de nas der skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-7: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-8: des kyang bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-9: der khyed kun gyis kyang lhan cig tu mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-10: yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-12: bsnyen bkur la brtson par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-13: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-14: lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-16: thags bzang ris la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen po 'dir gshegs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246a-20: der khyed 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir bdag gi skabs phye lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-0: bdag gi @246b gnas su sbyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-1: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-9: kha dog thams cad ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-11: de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag du ma la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-13: khyed cag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-15: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gnas su sbyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-16: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gzhon nu dpal gyi gzi brjid la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-18: khyod song la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag tshol la nga'i 'phrin 'di skad ces gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-19: bdag gi pha'i mchid nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bshos gsol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-20: rgya mtsho chen por sbyon cig ces gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-21: leg so zhes byas te mnyan nas ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis byas so; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i rgyal po shugs drag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-23: khyod song la ri rab kyi steng du song ste klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-24: nye dga' gnyis kyang bos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-25: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:246b-27: rgya mtsho chen por bdag gi gnas su sbyon cig ces gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-0: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i @247a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-1: bu shugs drag ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-3: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi thad du song nas ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du bos so; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rang gi gnas su 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa beed'urya sngon po dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-4: dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas pa bshams te rin po che du mas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-6: rin po che'i dra bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-8: dril ngu g-yer ka'i dra ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-10: dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-14: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-16: rgya mtsho'i spos kyi mchog gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-20: 'khor gyi khyams yangs shing rgya che ba de'i nang du bcom ldan 'das sengge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-21: rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-22: lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu rnam pa sna tshogs du ma mang po bting /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-23: bla bre bres pa rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bus bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-24: rin po che'i dra bas khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-25: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dpyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-26: dar gyi lda ldi btags pas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-27: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-28: dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi gdan yang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-29: ro brgya bsgos pa'i zhal zas dag kyang bshams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247a-30: thams cad legs par zin par rig nas bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-0: 'khor dang bcas @247b te ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim la 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod bab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-1: chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes rgya chen khyed brnyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-2: ye shes 'byung gnas mkha' 'dra ye shes mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-3: 'jig rten 'das pa spyan yangs dag pa'i spyan dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-4: phan pa mdzad pa gdugs tshod bab kyi gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-5: tshangs pa'i gsung dang rnam dag gsung ldan dbyangs snyan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-6: ka la pingka'i rnga sgra bdud rtsi'i don ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-7: sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs sna tshogs mun sel ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-8: sems can rin chen gdugs tshod bab kyi gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-9: zhi zhing rab zhi thugs mnga' rtag tu zhi bar spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-10: rgyal ba grol ba lha dang mi rnams rab grol mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-11: chu bo bzhi las rgal ba 'gro ba dgrol ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-12: pha rol gshegs pa bde sbyin gdugs tshod dus la bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-13: sbyin dul yang dag sdom dgyes tshul khrims yongs su dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-14: bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus chen po brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-15: bsam gtan rnam thar dgyes pa shes rab yongs su rdzogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-16: zhal ras zla 'dra gdugs tshod bab kyi gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-17: lam mkhyen lam la mkhas shing lam srang ngan pa spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-18: byang chub yan lag dbang stobs bden pa bzhi ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-19: yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul bzhi dran dang ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-20: thams cad zil mnon yon tan mnga' ba gdugs tshod bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:247b-21: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' bsod nams brgya yi tog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-1: rnams bsod nams zhing chen bcom ldan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-2: mchod sbyin dam pa bzhes pa'i 'os lags yon gyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-3: byams la dgyes pa gdugs tshod bab kyi gshegs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-4: lhun po 'dra zhing sa dang mtshungs la sbyor ba snyoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-5: byams sdang mi mnga' nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-6: mi yi dbang po khengs pa mi mnga' dman mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-7: stong dang rnam par thar la dgyes pa gdugs tshod bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-8: kun mkhyen kun la mkhas pa dus dang cho ga mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-9: chos rnams dbye la mkhas pa rtag tu dul bzhin spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-10: sems can bsam pa rab mkhyen don rig mkhyen pa ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-11: chos kyi ngo bo nyid mkhyen gdugs tshod dus la bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gdugs tshod bab pa de thugs su chud nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-14: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gdugs tshod bab kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-16: chos gos longs la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-17: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248a-20: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-0: lha ma yin @248b gyi tshogs kyis bstod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-1: ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du steng gi bar snang la 'phags te gshegs nas 'od zer ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-10: rgya mtsho'i 'gram ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na dga' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tsampa ka'i tshal ga la ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-11: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-12: mchod pa byas nas gdugs tshod phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-13: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas su gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-15: bdag gis rigs pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-17: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir them skas ji lta bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas dzambu gling du gshegs pa de kho na lta bu'i them skas dag byin gyis brlabs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:248b-18: them skas de dag las bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs par bya gor ma chag snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-0: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram nas rang gi gnas kyi bar du them skas kyi rim pa gsum bshams te @249a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-6: mu tig dmar po las byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-7: rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-8: bkra ba; blta na sdug pa dag bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po sus kyang mig gis ma mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-10: chus kyang sems can dag la gnod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las kyang 'od gang gis rgya mtsho chen po snang bar gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od 'gyed par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-12: rgya mtsho chen po na sems can gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'od des reg pa tsam gyis byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-15: bde ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-16: phyin chad su'ang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba med cing gnod pa byed pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-17: de dag thams cad gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-19: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang chos mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-20: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bkod pa blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-0: nyan thos @249b chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-3: 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-11: mi dag mi ma yin pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' ba'i tsampa ka'i tshal nas langs te klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos them skas kyi rim pa bshams pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas them skas dbus ma la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-16: nyan thos chen po rnams 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-18: brgya byin bye ba phrag drug cu lag pa g-yas pas lam mtshon par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-19: tshangs pa bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-20: nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i gdugs rnams 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-21: lha bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod de me tog gi char 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-23: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-24: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir sil snyan bye ba phrag drug cu dkrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-25: lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi bshul spos chus chag chag 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-27: klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:249b-28: nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khor de ro stod khebs pa'i mu tig gi phreng ba dag 'phyang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-0: @250a *// mi'am ci bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-1: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas bstod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-2: dri za bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me tog gi phreng ba rnams 'phyang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-4: lha ma yin bye ba phrag drug cu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-5: ras bcos bu kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'gebs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-6: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'ang 'khor bye ba phrag brgya nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-17: lha'i bkod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-18: de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po drug khri bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-20: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dga' bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250a-22: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-0: de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i bkod pa snga ma gang yin pa de @250b mog mog por byed cing mi mngon par byed pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-1: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzod dka'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-4: glang chen spos kyi glang po gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sengge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang gi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzum pa nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-8: chos thams cad la dbang byed pa gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dkyil 'khor can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:250b-10: rin chen ta la gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po rin chen dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i snying po nas kyang byang chub sems @251a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-1: dpa' mthong ba don yod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-2: rnam par gnon pa don yod gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu lta ba nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-4: chos kyi rgyal po gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong na dga' ba nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-8: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gnyis 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-9: de ltar phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba mang po klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dga' bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-12: sangs rgyas kyi tshong phrul chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-13: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-14: sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251a-15: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-0: sangs @251b rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-1: sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-2: sangs rgyas kyi sengge'i sgra chen pos phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-3: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gis go bar mdzad nas lha 'bum gyi sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-4: glu dbyangs len cing me tog gi char 'bebs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-5: ngan song thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-6: skye ba rab tu zhi bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-7: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-8: yid bde ba bsgrubs nas snying rje chen po brtan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-9: bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bus rin po che'i them skas de dag las rgya mtsho chen por gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-10: de lta bu'i klu'i dbyangs len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med par gsung gis go bar mdzad nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:251b-13: gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-0: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @252a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-1: pa sh'akya thub pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-2: de na lha'i bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-4: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-5: lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-6: nam mkha' lding gi du mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-9: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum dag gis sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-10: glu'i dbyangs len cing bcom ldan 'das mdun nas bsu nas de'i tshe rgyud kyi sgra skad las 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-11: sbyin pa las byung tshul khrims mdzes dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-12: bzod pa'i stobs las byung ba byams pa bsgoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-13: brtson 'grus las byung don gyi rgya mtsho las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-14: bsam gtan rnam thar dgyes pa khyod phyag 'tshal; ;shes rab 'od ldan dgongs pa rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-15: 'od dang gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon par brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-16: rnam par grol ba mngon sum ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-17: thub pa nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-18: brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs pa brtul zhugs mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-19: dka' thub mthar phyin rtogs par thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-20: mig ni sbyin par mdzad cing mig sbyong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-21: 'gro ba kun tu rgyu ba 'gro ba'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-22: don dam zab mo shin tu ston pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252a-23: gzhan la phan pa zla med thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-0: chags pa med par tshig gi don ston @252b pa; ;gzhan la phan pa dpe med 'od mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-1: dus skabs mkhyen pa kun tu ston pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-2: rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs kun rab 'joms pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-3: brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs pa brtul zhugs mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-4: bdud rtsi'i bde skyid bde ba sbyin mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-5: nam mkha' 'dra zhing dgongs pa dag pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-6: dri ma kun sel rnam par 'dren pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-7: yon tan rgya mtsho bsod nams mi zad gpa; ;rgya mtshor 'jug pa ye shes rgya mtshor ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-8: chos kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs sel mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-9: chos kyi sbyin bdag ser sna mi mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-10: chos kyi rin chen nor mchog sbyin gmdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-11: chos mchog ye shes de nyid ston pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-12: dga' ba ston pa bde ba ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-13: bag la nyal gyi nyes pa spong ba ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-14: ri yi dbang po bzhin du mi g-yo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-16: mi dang lha dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-17: lha min srin po mi'am ci yi bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-18: klu rnams dang ni grul bum gnod sbyin rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-19: khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-20: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-21: rab mdzes shin tu dpe med ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-22: gser gyi mdog can dpal ldan mdog sdug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-23: sen mo zangs 'dra mdog sdug phyag mthil mnyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-24: ka la pingka'i gdangs can ya mtshan gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:252b-25: tshangs ba lha dbang gdangs can gdangs kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-0: gsung gis stong gsum so sor @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-2: 'jam gnyen gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-3: dbang po dul zhing thugs kyang dul ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-4: zhal ras zla ba 'dra zhing spyan legs pa; ;rtag tu bden pa gsung zhing mnyam par bzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-5: rtag tu chos 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-6: rga nad sdug bsngal rab tu grol mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-7: 'gro ba'i don mdzad nyon mongs spong mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-8: rgyal bar 'os pa 'dud 'joms rgyal ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-9: skye ba mi bzad de nyid ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-10: dgra bcom dgra yi tshogs rnams rab 'joms pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-11: lha las 'das pa lha mang rnams kyis mchod; ;khyod ni rtag tu bzhes pa'i 'os kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-12: skye rgu kun mchog 'dren pa bzang po lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-13: de nas lha'i bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-19: dri za'i bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas thams cad gcig tu mthun par gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253a-21: rgya mtsho chen po'i gting gi dkyil gyi gnas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs nas sengge'i khri de la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-0: dge slong gi dge @253b 'dun rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang stan ji ltar bshams pa de dag la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-2: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs par rig nas bu dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-6: gnyen 'dab dang 'khor dang bcas pas rang gis lag gi zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-7: bsod pa mang pos tshim par byed cing ci bzhes stob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-8: tshim par byas shing ci bzhes pa bstabs nas bshos gsol lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-9: btsang sder gyu ba dang phyag bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-20: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshogs te 'khod par thugs su chud nas bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:253b-23: mchog tu dga' ba'i chos mnyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sku las 'gyed par mdzad de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:275b-13: kha dog mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276a-2: skrag pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi sa srung ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276b-0: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis ras phrag zar 'di las dum @276b bu dum bur khyer du zin kyang ras phrag zar 'di yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276b-1: de dag gis gos ji tsam gyi tshad du 'gyur bar 'dod na'ang de las de dag gi gos de tsam du 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276b-21: bye brag tu bya ba'am; tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:276b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-2: ras phrag zar de la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-13: bskal pa bzang po 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-14: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-18: de ltar 'jig rten na yon gnas yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-19: de la sems bskyed pa tsam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277a-20: de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi 'tshal ma bkur sti ci bgyi lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:277b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:278b-17: sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir mkhas pas srog gi phyir yang gzhan gyi srog mi gcod cing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yun ji srid gnas pa de srid du'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson par bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-13: tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyags pas myos shing mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-14: slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rgyags pas myos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-15: bdag nyid ni; tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-18: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-20: gnod pa byas te lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-22: yid ma bsdams shing sdig pa mang po byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de la'ang de dag gis mchod pa mang po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279a-24: des na khyed sems can dmyal bar ma song ste; dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'dir skyes nas 'di ltar sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i phyir khyod kyis srog gcod pa mang du byas shing sdig pa'i las mang du byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-0: mang po dag @279b kyang 'jigs par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de dang der dge sbyong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do; ;de dag gis mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-5: dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing srung dka' ba lags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de ma mnyes par bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-9: bdag cag gis slan chad rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar 'tshal gyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:279b-17: da rang gi mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-0: @280a *// nga ni; rang gi gnas su 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par gdan de las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyir yang rin po che'i them skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-3: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas mgur bsal te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-4: de nas rgya mtsho'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-5: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang mis mchod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-6: lha min dbang pos bsnyen bkur mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-7: padma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-8: dge ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin deng phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-9: gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-10: yon tan ye shes 'phags pa rnam 'dren deng phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-11: sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang po brtsegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-12: bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-13: brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-14: shes rab mkha' mtshungs khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-15: byams pas snyoms pa'i thugs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280a-16: 'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu btang snyoms pha rol gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-0: ka @280b la pingka lta bur gsung snyan tshangs skad ston //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-2: bdud dpung 'joms pa bdud stobs nges par 'joms mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-3: byang chub brtul zhugs sgrub pa srid gsum srid pas mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-4: dri gsum dri ma sbyong ba rnam thar gsum ston par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-5: 'jig rten gsum grags khyod la de ring ma gos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-6: bden pa'i brtul zhugs bzang rtogs rtag tu chos kyis 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-7: rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ye shes spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-8: nyon mongs dgra 'joms gzi brjid lhag par gzi bskyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-9: padma lta bu'i spyan mnga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-10: lhun po'i rtse 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bur brtan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-11: dgongs pas 'dra yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-12: 'gro la stong pa ston pa zhi gnas pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-13: rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-14: bdud rtsi dam pa ston pa 'gro min 'gro ba gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-15: lha dang mis mchod khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal; ;sa steng lha yul grags pa snyan dang grags pa 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-16: yon tan rgya chen mi bzad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-17: ji skad gsungs bzhin mdzad cing ji skad mdzad bzhin gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-18: ji skad spyod bzhin skul ba deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:280b-19: rga shi grol mdzad sman pa 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-0: thar pa'i lam ston khyod la de ring mgos phyag @281a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-2: rgyu yi byed pa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-3: lam mchog ston pa rgyal ba khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-4: rin chen sbyin pa gcig pu chos kyi dga' ba gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-5: sa 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-6: 'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-7: bdag gis bsod nams gang lags des ni khyod 'drar shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-8: de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-10: bcom ldan 'das slar byung ste gshegs pas rgya mtsho chen po mi mdzes pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-11: ci nas bdag rgya mtsho mdzes par bgyid pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan na legs so; ;de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-18: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281a-19: sems can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-0: bsam pa'i sbyor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo @281b ba'i sems bskyed pa dga' bar gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-1: sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-4: shes bzhin du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-5: sngon gyi dge ba chud mi za ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-6: shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhing chos 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-7: phan pa'i dngos pos sems can thams cad la yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-8: gnyis su med pas gong du khyab par rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-9: sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-11: chos bcu po de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-12: rgyan du 'dul ba yin no; ;de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-13: rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma lha mo khri dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-15: rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-19: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-20: rgya mtsho chen po'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:281b-21: byang chub kyi sems de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du @282a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-1: bdag cag gis bskyed lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-6: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson pa kho nar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-8: grong khyer du gshegs pa na'ang bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-9: chos kyi dben pa'i gtam mdzad pa na'ang 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa sgrub par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-13: sangs rgyas khri la mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-14: 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa'ang bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-15: dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bsrungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-18: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-19: dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-21: bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282a-22: bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa @282b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-1: de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyid kyi lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-2: yid bde ba skyes te rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che dang rin thang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-4: bdag ni thub pa ye shes yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de yis lung bstan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-5: bdag ni 'dren par 'gyur ba dag la yid gnyis the tshom ci yang yod ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-6: stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad 'gas shing zla ba sa la lhung yang gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-7: lha las lhag pa'i lhas mchod sangs rgyas phyin ci log gi tshig gsum yong mi gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-8: bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs ni 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi mnga' ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-9: bdag ni stong pa'i ye shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par bgyid la ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-10: bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-11: de yis 'dren ni bdag gi sems kyi yul bden mkhyen nam de bzhin lud yang bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:282b-12: smon pa rab mchog bde sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-1: gnyen skyob pa 'jigs pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-2: rgyal ba lam mchog dam pa ston mdzad lam ngan yongs su spyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-3: 'jig rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-4: 'dir ni lha dang mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams thos pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-5: byang chub spyod cing byang chub bsam pa sems pa de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-6: de dag la ni ngan song ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-7: de dang de dag lha dang mi yi bde la nges shing zhi ba'i go 'phang thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dags 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-19: mi ma lags pa mang po dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-21: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-22: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las cung zad tsam 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283a-23: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i bkod pa chen po'i khang bzang gi nang du bzhugs par gsol la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-0: bya rgod kyi phung @283b po'i ril skyel bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-3: 'di'i dus la bab par shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-5: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dags sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-6: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang bzang byin gyis brlabs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-7: der bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring dang bcas par bzhugs par gsol nas steng gi bar snang las gshegs te klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang sil snyan byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-9: glu dbyangs len cing me tog gi char chen po 'bebs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-11: phye ma sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs bzhin du mthar gyis bcom ldan 'das bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-12: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bu dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-13: chung ma dang g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-15: bdag cag gis ma 'byor bar gyur pa gang lags pa rnams bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-18: rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du de dang 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:283b-20: sems can thams cad kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rin po che lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems @284a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-1: can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-2: yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de tsam tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags pa'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; klu'i bdag po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-7: byang chub sems dpa' nan tan byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mchod pa nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-8: bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-10: bcos ma ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-12: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-15: zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-17: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-19: kha gsag thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-21: spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-22: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284a-24: 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-0: 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par @284b blangs pa mi 'dor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-2: dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-3: dben pa la dga' zhing be mo'i gtam yongs su spong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-5: sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-6: ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-8: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-12: gang zag med par nye bar rtogs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te; gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-14: stong pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-15: mtshan ma med pa la nges par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-16: smon pa dang bral ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te; rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-18: rkyen 'di la nyid la 'jug cing mthar lta ba sel ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-21: chad par lta ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-23: ma skyes par bzod pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-25: rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-30: sems kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:284b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-3: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-6: 'khor gsum yongs su bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-7: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-8: dri ma gsum gyi dri ma sal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-9: khams gsum la mi rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-10: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-11: rig pa gsum gyi rig pa shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-32: pheg rdob pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag kyang ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-36: bla na med pa'i mchod pa de nyid yongs su sbyong ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-38: shin tu mthar thug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-39: shin tu dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285a-40: shin tu tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-0: dge @285b ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slob pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-1: 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la sems gnas kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-5: gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-8: byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-9: snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-10: brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-11: chos zab mo rgya chen po la sems bskyed pas bzod pa skyes pa thob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-13: chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-20: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-25: tshong dpon rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su ba shos gsol nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:285b-26: zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-0: rgyal po ma skyes dgra g-yog @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-1: 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs de na mchis pa de gang du mchi lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rgyal po chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-6: gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang bar mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-7: de'i chu'i phung po de dag gang du song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-11: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de lta bur las su rung bar gyur pa lags so; ;bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-13: khyod kyis de nyan thos ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-14: snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i sems las su rung ba las gyur par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-16: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286a-18: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-0: @286b chos la dbang yod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-3: gang gi tshe nga rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe chu de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-4: bdag nyid chu'i nang na gnas so snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-5: skam sa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-6: rgya mtsho chen po skam par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-7: ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin du klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-9: lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-10: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-13: rnam par 'tshe ba med par gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-19: 'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-20: de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-22: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos yun ji srid ci gnas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:286b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-0: @287a *// de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-2: yun ji srid cig na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-4: de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-6: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-10: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pas ces grangs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-12: yun ring ba; tshad med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi ba zhes bya ba la shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rnam par dag ba'i 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yongs su dag pa de'i bkod pa byung ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287a-20: de'i tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang rgyas par bstan par sla ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-0: rgyal po chen @287b po; de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po de la lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du mchod pa byas te dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-2: skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod chen mang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-3: dpag med rgya chen bsam yas byas zin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-4: 'gro ba dag la snying brtse bskyed nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-5: rab mchog byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-6: byang chub sems ni yang dag sgrub byed gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-7: de ni mchod mchog dam pa khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-8: de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur sti yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-9: de ni phyi ma'i bsod nams gzi byin yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-10: bam po bdun pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-12: de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-13: de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g-yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:287b-14: thal mo sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-0: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di @288a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-2: gzugs la brkam dang sgra la brten pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-3: dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-4: 'dod la brkam dang bde ba dga' ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-5: byang chub phyogs 'di rtogs par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-6: le lo can dang dma' la brtson pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-7: ser sna can dang tshul khrims ma bsngams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-8: sdang ba'i sems dang blo ni 'khrul pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-9: byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-10: rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-12: brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu chos 'dod gang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-19: thos nas bdag ni byang chub mchog la zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-20: de yi slad du sangs rgyas mi yi mchog /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288a-24: yid gnyis sam; the tshom za na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288b-3: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288b-14: rin po che sa yas spras par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288b-15: dzambu chu bo'i gser las grub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:288b-16: rin po che sna tshogs du mas bris shing mig mang ris su rnam par phye la lag mthil bzhin du mnyam ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-2: longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi de dag gi'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grags pa zhes bya ba de na rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-4: shing ta la de dag gi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-6: 'bras bu thams cad las chos kyi sgra khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po dag 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-13: sgra de dag thams cad chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-14: de bzhin du zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-15: rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-16: nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-17: dga' ba dang dben pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-21: thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289a-26: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom med pa sha stag go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-3: 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong gsung pa'i chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-5: de na lha dang mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de'ang mthong la chos bstan pa de'ang thos nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-6: mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-9: mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'i bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i padma dag la skyil mo rkung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:289b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil nyid na sengge'i khri la bzhugs te lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-2: de chos ston pa na phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grang med pa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can su'ang chos la zhe 'gras pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-4: de na bdud sdig can dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-5: gzhan mu stegs can dag gi sgrar gdags pa'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni; bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-13: chos bstan pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-14: zhabs 'bring 'khor byang chub sems dpa' yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-15: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:290a-24: byang chub kyi spyod pa ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-2: yi dvags sdug bsngal 'di na bkres dang skom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-3: 'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal rnams su nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-4: skyabs med gyur dang rten med gyur pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-5: 'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-6: drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-7: sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-8: byang chub sems dpa' bskal mang bye bar yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-9: brtul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la brtson; ;srid ma mchis pa de 'dra mkhyen nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-10: 'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'dul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-11: gang tshe chos rnams gsog dang gsob tu gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-12: nam mkha' chang stong 'dra zhing snying po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-13: de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-14: bdag med dngos med dngos po med pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-15: mtha' rnams kun tu lta ba kun spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-16: byang chub rdul med rnam dag thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-17: skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-18: 'chi dang gnas pa gang lags su yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-19: gang 'dir skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-20: shed las skyes dang shed du de ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-21: 'di na bdag dang bdag gi ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-22: gang zag shed skyes shed bu yod ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295a-23: 'di brdzun bdag po ma mchis dbang ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-0: 'tsho ba'i @295b 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bur 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-1: byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-2: 'on kyang las ma chis 'bras bu don ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-3: 'gro ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis rang bzhin 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-4: phan tshun du ni rgyul brten par 'dus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-5: dge dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-6: gang zhig bsgoms dang gang zhig mang du bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-7: yul na ma mchis phyogs na ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-8: ngo bo nyid stong 'on kyang rnam par smin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-9: nang dang slad rol bar na mi gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-10: chos rnams gang du'ang 'phungs par yong ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-11: de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma mchis la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-12: rnam par smin pa slu bar yong mi bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-13: skyes pa mi mnga' 'gags pa mnga' ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-14: mkhas pa rnams ni go bar bgyi slad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-15: nyan pa la ni smra bas tshig kyang bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-16: lta ba rnam par spyad pa'i slad du bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-17: gang gi 'du shes 'du shes can ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-18: mya ngan 'das mchis su yang zhi ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-19: skye ba ma mchis mtha' gang mtha' de lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-20: bdag gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtha'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-21: kun gyi mtha' ni mtha' mnyam thob pa des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-22: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab dam pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-23: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang ni; ;skye ba'i mtha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtha'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-24: mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:295b-25: chags med mtha' yi sgo shes ldan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-0: dus gsum mtha' rnams la ni ma @296a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-2: rgyal ba rnams kyi rigs mchog thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-3: 'gro ba bcings las rnam par grol mdzad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-4: zhi mchog mya ngan 'das pa brnyes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-5: 'gro kun rmi lam lta bur des gzigs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-6: 'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems ma chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-7: chos kun las ni rnam par dag pa'i mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-8: zhi ba dang ni mi g-yo mi 'gul thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-9: chos rnams thams cad sgra med skad med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-10: gzung du med cing dngos med rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-11: de bzhin rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyi gdung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-12: zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de smon pa spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-13: skyon med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-14: spros kun nye bar zhi zhing bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-15: rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi ni chos 'di dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-16: gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang skad ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-17: 'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-18: de yang yi ge rnams kyis gleng zhing bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-19: gang gis 'jig rten bla mar rang 'byung mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-20: mthong nas kyang ni yid la dad bgyid dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-21: khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-22: lha dang mi rnams rnyed pa legs par rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-23: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-24: 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-25: gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'gyur ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-26: thams cad kyang ni mnyam pa'i chos su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296a-27: sgra rnams thams cad brag ca tsam du bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-0: @296b de ni brjod na rna bar grag par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-1: de ni tshul bzhin lam gyi rgyud 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-2: chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-3: chos kun sgyu ma 'dra zhing gsog lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-4: de dag sems can slad du rnam par phye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-5: de dag rang bzhin ngo bo gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-6: de ni nam yang rnam par dbyer mi rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-7: 'jig rten na ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-8: chos kyi dbang phyug kun rig kun mkhyen pa; ;ston pa de la slob na de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-9: 'phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-10: byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-11: ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba gang lags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-12: thams cad la yang thub pa skyes mchog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-13: ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-14: skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-15: dogs ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-16: bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-17: bdag la som nyi ma mchis dogs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-18: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-21: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ci nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-22: khyod kyi nang nas su dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar spro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-23: de nas der byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:296b-24: lha'i bu khri stan las langs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-0: @297a *// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-2: bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-6: khyed kyis chos sgrub pa ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-7: de nas der byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-8: bdag gis dam pa'i chos gzung bar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-9: ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-14: byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ltabs gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-16: bdag gis mtshams ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-17: ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam; bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-20: nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297a-21: byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-6: ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-13: bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci'ang ma 'tshal cing mi 'dzin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-14: ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-24: ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-29: byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pas gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-31: chos ma lags pa'ang mi ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-32: bdag las chos kyi sgra'ang mi 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-33: chos kyi 'du shes pa'ang rtog par mi bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-34: ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:297b-39: byang chub sems dpa' ming med pas gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:299b-25: chos de dag kyang chos kyang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:299b-26: chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:299b-34: bu mo rin chen gyis gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:299b-38: sems can thams cad kyi go cha'ang bdag gis bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:299b-39: de dag kyang gtan du bdag gis ma mthong na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300a-22: 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams kyis 'dir rnam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300a-24: brda sna tshogs kyi chos nyid de kho na gleng ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300a-25: chos gang dang yang 'gal bar mi bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300a-26: chos thams cad kyang byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i @300b chos rnam par nges pa ston pa la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-1: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen pa kur byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-2: bzod pa thob pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-4: gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-5: gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung ba de dag la bstan pa'i phyir khyod la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-8: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i chog byas par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-13: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-14: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po de dag la'ang bstab par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin bsam pa'i rdo mi thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis phan gdags pa'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-22: gzhan yang ci nas bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-23: phyir rgol pa nges par bcom nas 'di dzambu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:300b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-4: gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis bdud thams cad dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-10: bha ya bi sho dha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-14: aa ku la sam sho dha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-27: ai ba ru dhe sa hi ta aarthe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-31: s'a ga ra ba ti; aa bhi te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-35: dza ti bi sho dha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-38: aa ba bh'a sa ba ti /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-43: sh'i la bi sho dha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-46: ni gri h'i tam ma ra ba la ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-47: ba ra dza yo dhishti ga t'a nam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-48: dzo l'a nam dha mo lk'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301a-59: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-2: rtsod pa'i bdag po bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-5: bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-11: byas pa tshor ba rjes su srung ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu bsod nams 'phags kyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-16: rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-17: bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-19: sangs rgyas spyan gyis phyogs bcu yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-20: zhing rnams ji snyed ngas mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-21: de kun rin chen gang byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-22: mi gang sbyin pa sbyin byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-23: gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-24: snying nas yongs su 'dzin byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-25: de bas mi de'i bsod nams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-27: bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-28: dpe rnams bstan pas bshad na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-29: dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:301b-30: bsod nams zad par yong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:302a-0: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na lha khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug gis bla na med pa yang @302a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-002:302b-20: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
